ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISBLANK( loan__ACH_End_Date__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK( loan__ACH_Start_Date__c )) && (loan__ACH_Start_Date__c > loan__ACH_End_Date__c) && ISPICKVAL(loan__Transaction_Type__c , 'Recurring ACH')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ACH end date should be greater than start date.
